ygData.subject: Re: lindel
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, actually, there is alot of water, yes, but at least we have an idea. I mean, before we were searching the entire planet, oceans and all.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, actually, there is alot of water, yes, but at least we have an idea. I
mean, before we were searching the entire planet, oceans and all.

>Well I hate to say it, but it wasn't much of a clue. I mean... there's a
>LOT of water in the game. Could be anywhere.
>
>Though one time I thought there might be something under all that water in
>ak'anon and I swam around all one day. Didn't find anything. I did find a
>place where you can swim behind the wall out in front of the mines where
>the
>Necro guild is, but I drowned and had to call a gm to get my corpse out.
>Maybe I'll see if I can find someone to cast endureing breath so I can
>search in there more fully.
>
>---
